description: After an easy summery weeknight dinner? Try this vegetable pasta recipe - it's made with wholemeal penne and abundant summer vegies like zucchini and yellow squash.
name: Summer Vegetable Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add cream and half the parmesan, then bring to a simmer. Season and add pasta, reserved cooking liquid and mint. Toss to coat. Serve pasta topped with remaining parmesan and extra mint leaves.
